title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident – July 9, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: July 9, 2024
Location: Walgreens, State Road 44, New Smyrna Beach, FL
Suspect: Christopher Morgan, 46
Incident Summary: Morgan allegedly hid in the Walgreens bathroom before closing time, remained inside until after hours, and then helped himself to store merchandise, consuming snacks and beverages. Officers responded to an alarm activation at approximately 3 a.m. and found Morgan inside, taking cigarettes from behind the counter. Upon questioning, he claimed he had entered the store to use the bathroom. Officers recovered multiple partially consumed items from his pockets. During his arrest, Morgan allegedly resisted being placed in a patrol car and spat on an officer. He was charged with burglary, petit theft, resisting an officer without violence, and battery on a law enforcement officer.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Made initial contact with Morgan inside the Walgreens.
Conducted the search and recovered stolen items.
Documented his statements and resistance to arrest.
Transported Morgan to the police station or jail.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident – July 10, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: July 10, 2024
Location: Universal Studios, Orlando, FL
Suspect: Stephen Rocco “Steve Will Do It” Deleonardis
Incident Summary: Deleonardis, an internet personality, was caught trespassing at Universal Studios despite having an active trespassing warning in place until August 7, 2024. He attempted to evade detection by wearing a cap, sunglasses, and a large fake mustache. Security recognized him and notified law enforcement. Upon police contact, Deleonardis acknowledged the warning and stated that he should have waited before attempting to return. He was arrested and later pleaded no contest to misdemeanor trespassing, receiving an additional one-year ban from Universal Studios.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Made contact with Deleonardis and confirmed his trespassing status.
Documented interactions regarding his prior trespassing warning.
Processed his arrest or issued any citations.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident – November 10, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: November 10, 2024
Suspect: Nick Fuentes
Incident Summary: Officers responded to a report that Nick Fuentes had pepper-sprayed and shoved a woman who had come to his residence. The victim stated she rang the doorbell, at which point Fuentes opened the door, immediately used pepper spray on her, and pushed her down the steps. He allegedly took her phone before returning inside. When officers arrived, Fuentes was uncooperative, initially refusing to speak about the incident and attempting to lead officers to the backyard rather than discussing the matter in the designated area. He was later arrested for battery.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the initial report and engaged with Nick Fuentes.
Retrieved the victim’s phone.
Participated in the investigation and subsequent arrest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Location: Brady Chase Boulevard & State Highway 540, Polk County, FL
Suspect: Sabastian Angel Suarez, 23
Incident Summary: Deputies were investigating a car crash when Suarez approached the scene, ignored lawful commands, and refused to comply with the Halo law requiring a 25-foot buffer for first responders. When asked to step back, he allegedly responded with profanity and insisted he could not be arrested due to his ankle monitor and court-ordered curfew. He was then taken into custody after resisting the deputy’s attempts to place him in a patrol car.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Engaged with Sabastian Angel Suarez at the crash scene.
Issued commands and warnings before his arrest.
Participated in his detainment and transport.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident – July 1, 2023 (Volusia County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: July 1, 2023
Location: 600 block of Clark Street, Daytona Beach, FL
Suspect: Nichole Maks, 37
Incident Summary: Officers responded to a fire at a residence where they discovered Michael Cerasoli, 79, deceased with blunt force trauma and multiple stab wounds. Maks was later located at a restaurant in Holly Hill, where she was found with blood on her clothing and in possession of a knife and hammer. During questioning, she allegedly attempted to destroy potential DNA evidence by pouring Diet Mountain Dew on herself and resisted arrest.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the fire and initial crime scene.
Encountered and detained Nichole Maks at the restaurant in Holly Hill.
Conducted her post-Miranda interview and subsequent arrest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
